statements: SELECT * FROM Demographics;
SELECT id, location, population_size FROM Demographics;
SELECT * FROM Demographics WHERE population_size > 10000;
SELECT id, location, population_size FROM Demographics ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT id, location, ethnicity_distribution FROM Demographics WHERE location='New York';
SELECT * FROM Demographics WHERE population_size > 1000 ORDER BY location ASC
SELECT id, location, population_size FROM Demographics WHERE age_distribution->'20-29' > 0 AND ethnicity_distribution->'White' > 0
SELECT location, COUNT(*) AS count FROM Demographics GROUP BY location HAVING count > 1 ORDER BY count DESC
SELECT id, gender_distribution->'Female' AS female_count, gender_distribution->'Male' AS male_count FROM Demographics WHERE location = 'New York'
SELECT SUM(population_size) AS total_population FROM Demographics
SELECT * FROM population_demographics ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT population_id, location, age, gender FROM population_demographics WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT location, gender, ethnicity FROM population_demographics WHERE age BETWEEN 30 AND 50;
SELECT * FROM relief_efforts WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT aid_type, amount, date FROM relief_efforts WHERE population_id = 101;
SELECT * FROM population_demographics WHERE age > 50 ORDER BY location DESC
SELECT location, age, gender FROM population_demographics WHERE gender = 'Male'
SELECT ethnicity, COUNT(*) as count FROM population_demographics GROUP BY ethnicity HAVING count > 100
SELECT location, aid_type, amount FROM population_demographics JOIN relief_efforts ON population_demographics.population_id = relief_efforts.population_id WHERE amount > 5000 ORDER BY location ASC
SELECT * FROM relief_efforts WHERE date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT id, location, age, gender FROM Demographics WHERE age > 30;
SELECT organization, location, start_date, end_date FROM ReliefEfforts WHERE organization = 'Red Cross';
SELECT population_size, affected_groups FROM PopulationAnalysis WHERE analysis_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Demographics WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT id, effort_name FROM ReliefEfforts ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Demographics WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY location ASC
SELECT effort_name, organization, location, start_date FROM ReliefEfforts WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY start_date DESC
SELECT id, analysis_date, population_size FROM PopulationAnalysis WHERE affected_groups LIKE '%children%'
SELECT id, location, gender FROM Demographics WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 40
SELECT * FROM ReliefEfforts WHERE organization = 'Red Cross'
SELECT * FROM demographics_data;
SELECT age_group, gender, ethnicity FROM demographics_data WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT organization, aid_type, funds_allocated FROM relief_efforts ORDER BY funds_allocated DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT relief_id, location FROM relief_efforts WHERE funds_allocated > 10000;
SELECT * FROM aid_distribution WHERE distribution_date >= '2022-01-01' AND distribution_date <= '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM demographics_data;
SELECT age_group, gender FROM demographics_data WHERE affected_population > 1000 ORDER BY age_group DESC;
SELECT organization, aid_type, funds_allocated FROM relief_efforts WHERE funds_allocated >= 50000 ORDER BY organization;
SELECT R.location, N.need_category, N.quantity_needed, N.urgency_level FROM relief_needs N JOIN relief_efforts R ON N.relief_id = R.relief_id;

SELECT D.distribution_date, D.distribution_location, R.location, N.quantity_needed FROM aid_distribution D JOIN relief_needs N ON D.relief_id = N.relief_id JOIN relief_efforts R ON D.relief_id = R.relief_id WHERE D.quantity_distributed > 1000 ORDER BY D.distribution_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM PopulationDemographics;
SELECT population_name, age_group, household_size FROM PopulationDemographics WHERE location = 'City';
SELECT effort_name, effort_description FROM ReliefEfforts WHERE effort_type = 'Medical';
SELECT worker_name, skills FROM ReliefWorkers WHERE worker_type = 'Volunteer' ORDER BY worker_name ASC;
SELECT supply_name, quantity, unit_of_measurement FROM ReliefSupplies ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM PopulationDemographics WHERE age_group = 'Adults' ORDER BY household_size DESC;
SELECT population_id, population_name, location FROM PopulationDemographics WHERE location = 'New York' AND household_size > 3;
SELECT effort_name, effort_type, location FROM ReliefEfforts WHERE effort_type = 'Medical' ORDER BY effort_id ASC;
SELECT worker_name, skills FROM ReliefWorkers WHERE supervisor_id = 101;
SELECT supply_name, quantity, unit_of_measurement FROM ReliefSupplies WHERE supply_type = 'Food' ORDER BY quantity DESC;
